definition: to let one's imagination roam
to float/superficial/floating/unstable/movable/provisional/temporary/transient/impetuous/hollow/inflated/to exceed/superfluous/excessive/surplus
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to fly fast

sentences.english: It is also the real response of local architecture of Chu.
sentences.chinese: 雖浮想聯翩，亦不失爲楚鄉土建築實狀的反映。

sentences.english: That night, always let a person thoughts thronged one's mind.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的夜晚，總讓人浮想聯翩。

sentences.english: Do self tanners keep you guessing?
sentences.chinese: 自助美黑還在讓你浮想聯翩？
這一發現令我浮想聯翩。

sentences.english: That makes so much sense. How about Ohio attacking Kentucky?
sentences.chinese: 這使我浮想聯翩。俄亥俄攻擊肯塔基又如何？

sentences.english: We could not help thinking when we saw the Great Wall in China.
sentences.chinese: 看到中國的長城，我們不禁浮想聯翩。

sentences.english: The following is one of my imagination.
sentences.chinese: 以下是我的浮想聯翩之一。

sentences.english: Ben: Did you just say "dry hump"?
Looking out the window of snow, I can not help but imagination.
sentences.chinese: 望着窗外的雪，我不禁浮想聯翩。

definition: (of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
to feel deep veneration for sb (idiom)
to tease/to poke fun at
to be secretly delighted
lit. as if drunk and stupefied (idiom)/fig. intoxicated by sth/obsessed with/mad about sth
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
as time goes by (idiom)
déjà vu (the experience of seeing exactly the same situation a second time)/seemingly familiar/apparently already acquainted
lit. slap the table and shout with praise (idiom); fig. wonderful!/amazing!/great!
young people decked out in gorgeous clothes (idiom)
lanterns red, wine green (idiom); feasting and pleasure-seeking/debauched and corrupt environment
thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
to whisper
sorrowful/dismal
cluster of flowers/inflorescence/flowering shrub
to hate/hatred/to resent/embittered
